kickstart.post:
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance login membership=Login node=login
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks set appliance attr login submit_host true /opt/rocks/bin/rocks set appliance attr login exec_host false
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks set appliance attr login primary_net public

/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=https action=ACCEPT network=public rulename="A40-HTTPS-PUBLIC-LAN"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=www action=ACCEPT network=public rulename="A40-WWW-PUBLIC_LAN"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login network=public \ output-network=private service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" \ chain="FORWARD" flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED" rulename="A50-FORWARD-RELATED"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login network=private \ service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="FORWARD" rulename="A60-FORWARD"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login output-network=public \ service="nat" protocol="all" action="MASQUERADE" chain="POSTROUTING" rulename="MASQUERADE"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login network=all service="8649" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block ganglia traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R10-GANGLIA-UDP"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login network=all service="3306" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block mysql traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R20-MYSQL-TCP"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall appliance=login network=all service="40000" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block foundation mysql traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R30-FOUNDATION-MYSQL"
